errorMessage.unregistered: Error: The username unregistered is not registered on this site. If you are unsure of your username, try your email address instead.
errorMessage.passwordEmpty: Error: The password field is empty.
errorMessage.registeringEmptyEmail: Please provide a valid email address.
errorMessage.registeringEmptyUsername: Please enter a valid account username.
errorMessage.registeringExistingUsername: An account is already registered with that username. Please choose another.
errorMessage.registeringExistingEmail: An account is already registered with your email address.
errorMessage.registeringInvalidEmail: Please include an '@' in the email address. 'invalid' is missing an '@'.

text.dashboardSecondBody: From your account dashboard you can view your recent orders, manage your shipping and billing addresses, and edit your password and account details.
